game.title: NieR:Automata
game.summary: NieR:Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their battle to reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.
game.comment: Un chef-d'œuvre d'action-RPG avec une narration profonde et une bande-son exceptionnelle

game.title: Pokémon Black Version
game.summary: Pokémon Black Version is one of the first games in the fifth generation of Pokémon games. It features a new region called Unova, with 156 new Pokémon.
game.comment: Une aventure captivante dans la région d'Unys

game.title: Pokémon White Version
game.summary: Pokémon White Version is one of the first games in the fifth generation of Pokémon games. It features a new region called Unova, with 156 new Pokémon.
game.comment: Une aventure captivante dans la région d'Unys

game.title: The Last of Us Part II
game.summary: The Last of Us Part II is an action-adventure game played from a third-person perspective. Players use firearms, improvised weapons, and stealth to defend against hostile humans and cannibalistic creatures infected by a mutated strain of the Cordyceps fungus.
game.comment: Une suite épique qui repousse les limites du storytelling dans les jeux vidéo
